title: The AutoPlay dialog box does not appear when connect E5220 to PC with USB cable
answer:
A: 

1. Please check if the computer OS meets one of the following:  

(1)     Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8

(2)     MAC OS X 10.5, MAC OS X 10.6, MAC OS X 10.7,MAC OS 10.8

2. Make sure E5220 is turned on (LED indicator has lighten up and WiFi icon has been green). To turn on E5220, hold and press “![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924091626950001.jpg)” until all the LED indicators lighten up. If E5220 is out of battery power, please charge it by USB cable or power adaptor.

3. Find the drive path ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924091626317002.jpg)**MobileWiFi**. It should appear as one virtual CD-ROM drive in ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924091626976003.jpg). Double click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924091626317002.jpg)**MobileWiFi** to open the folder of “E5220”, double click “![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924091626913004.jpg) AutoRun.exe” to install E5220 and drivers manually.  

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924091626924005.jpg)

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924091626607006.jpg)

4. If the drive path ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924091626317002.jpg)**MobileWiFi **not showing up, make sure there is no damage on USB cable and no contamination at PC USB connectors. Try to re-plug in USB connectors (both end of USB cable) to E5220 and computer again.
